data.title: Redefined: J.R. Smith
data.meta_description: J.R. Smith is known as an infamous basketball superstar with a reputation for being shirtless, stirring up controversy and having a killer 3-point shoâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Mullilgan

J.R. Smith, his friends and family reflect on JR's NBA career, and J.R. arrives on campus to a warm welcome from his fellow North Carolina A&T Aggies - everyone is excited to have the NBA champion on campus.

29 min Â· Apr 4, 2023

EPISODE 2

Three the Hard Way

J.R. meets his new team and quickly realizes there will be no gimmes here â he has to earn his spot on the team like everyone else. Senior teammates Diego and Xavier give him the freshman treatment as he adjusts to online classes and gets a feel for A&Tâs famous âAggie Prideâ.

28 min Â· Apr 4, 2023

EPISODE 3

Reading the Green

While J.R. embraces his studies at an HBCU steeped in social justice history, he becomes an advocate for the A&T golf team and prepares for his highly anticipated collegiate golf debut.

31 min Â· Apr 4, 2023
